name: Bike Attack: Crazy Moto Racing
description:
Are you ready for bike racing games 2017 consisting of the closest to the real world physics bike? Race and stunt the bike through a never ending exciting road adventure with multiple amazing bikes. Fight with other bikes by kicking and punching and shooting on their bikes so that their attention from the race deviates. Tilt the phone left right to move bike left right.

Feature:
- Awesome 3D graphics
- Amazing highway environment
- Good quality of sound
- Good control on bike
- Feel free to download and enjoy this game
- Stunning Game Play
- Outstanding 3D Visuals
